displayUnequipped.hint: Choose whether to display unequipped items on the HUD
displayUnequipped.name: Display Unequipped

displayMookSkillWithZeroMod.name: Display Mook Skills With Zero Mod

displayCharacterSkillWithZeroMod.name: Display Player Skills With Zero Mod

equipThrownWeapon.hint: If enabled, Characters and Mooks without the Thrown Weapon item will automatically get the item added to their inventory.
equipThrownWeapon.name: Automatically Equip Thrown Weapon

equipUnarmed.hint: If enabled, Characters and Mooks without the Unarmed item will automatically get the item added to their inventory.
equipUnarmed.name: Automatically Equip Unarmed
